amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit the use of funds to designate any nonbank financial company as "too big to fail" or as a "systemically important financial institution" or to make a determination that material financial distress at a nonbank financial company could pose a threat to U.S. financial stability.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to designate any nonbank financial company as "too big to fail" or as a "systemically important financial institution" or to make a determination that material financial distress at a nonbank financial company could pose a threat to U.S. financial stability.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A044) offered by Mr. Garrett.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Garrett amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
